a black-and-white plover, Venellus vanellus with broad, rounded wings, noted for spectacular aerial displays and shrill wailing cry; a lapwing.
(dial.) any of a family (Picidae) of piciform birds distinguished by stiff tail feathers used for support, a strong, pointed, chisel-shaped bill used for drilling holes in bark; a woodpecker.

a seed in gen.
a relatively thin, flat piece of a metal or stone.
a cup made of the areca sheet.
the place used by certain insects as dwelling place or for laying their eggs; a nest.
a sheet used to cover the arecanut bunches on the tree.
a kind of pudding made in a cup of arecanut sheet and cooked in steam.
the quality or fact of being vain or excessively proud of oneself or one's qualities or possessions; self-conceit; vanity.
a wild, lawless person, often a member of a gang of criminals; a scoundrel.
the perennial vine Citrullus colocynthus ( = Cucumis colocynthis) of Cucurbitaceae family; colocynth.
its fruit which is dried and used in making a strong cathartic.
the dried gourd of certain plants, used as a floating aid or dried nut (as coconut, areca nut, etc.).
to make a cup from the areca sheet.
to become motionless or inflexible from cold.
a short, thin splinter of the slender stem of the grass Aristida depressa, used to stitch cups from areca sheets.
the tree Ficus drupacea (var. pubescens) ( = F. mysorensis) of Moraceae family; Mysore fig.
its fig.
a stool or a table used in climbing a tree.
= ಕೊಠಾರ.
a part of a building enclosed by walls or partitions, floor and ceiling; a room.
a storehouse for threshed grain; a granary.
a tax levied on granaries, warehouse, etc.
the work, duty, office of the superintendent of a granary.
the state or time of being a girl (of age below seven years).
a very young girl.
a round vessel made of metal, earthenware, with a narrow neck, for holding or drawing water (from a well).
a cup like pan of a weighing balance.
the structure of six-sided wax cells made by bees to hold their honey or eggs; a honey-comb.
the direction to the left of a person facing north; the direction of the horizon in which the sun sets; west.
the organ of hearing and balance in humans and vertebrates, esp. the external part of this; the ear.
the act of giving, donating, handing over, passing on etc.
a kind of ear-ornament, usu. an ear-ring worn by men.
the vine Cissus repens ( = Vitis repens) of Vitaceae family.
to give, bestow or gift.

a land gifted as an endowment to a person, as a mark of recognition, which is exempt from paying tax.

its edible fruit.
a tool with a heavy metal or wooden head mounted at right angles to the handle, used for breaking, driving nails, etc.; a hammer.
a bamboo or cane basket used to catch fish in flowing water; a fish-trap.
the quality, condition of being crooked, serpentine; crookedness.
a kind of military weapon.
the act, practice of giving and taking between two persons or among many; exchange.
the giving of a girl in marriage to another family and bringing another girl from that family in marriage; mutual marriages.
and the relation established by such marriages.
the tree Bauhinia diphylla of Caesalpiniaceae family.
the common langur, Presbytis entellus.
a monkey in gen. 3) a mischievous or imitative person regarded as a monkey.
a mocking or bantering remark; jibe; a taunt ; a joke.
a community (known as Koḍava) mainly hailing from Koḍagu region of Karnāṭaka.
a man belonging to this community or from this region.
a foreigner, esp. one belonging to a foreign religion.
the direction to the left of a person facing north; it is the point on the horizon at which the centre of the sun sets at the equinox; west.
a short-handled farming tool with a semicircular blade, used for cutting corn, lopping or trimming; a sickle.
the plant Rungia repens of Acanthaceae family.

an irrigated land gifted to a person, as a mark of recognition, which is usu. exempt from paying tax.
a woman belonging to koḍava community or Koḍagu region.
a man who is endowed with a land in recognition of his service.

an arable land gifted to a person, as a mark of recognition, which is usu. exempt from paying tax.
an ear resembling a round vessel or cup.
the southernmost district of Karnāṭaka, which formerly was an independent state.
the language, a dialect of Kannaḍa, spoke by people of this area (popularly known as Koḍava).
a sword with a broad blade and a hooked point, used by Koḍavas.
the mountain range in Koḍagu district of Southern Karnāṭaka.
a girl of age below seven years.
the state or time of being a girl (of age below seven years).
the state or fact of being a virgin; maidenhood; sexual chastity; virginity.

the pain caused by contraction of a muscle or muscles from chill.
the pain of a sore.
absence of heat or lack of normal warmth; a low temperature; coldness.

a tool with a heavy metal or wooden head mounted at right angles to the handle, used for breaking, driving nails, etc.; a hammer.
